meanings.definition: A large conical mass of refined sugar.
meanings.sent1: The bakery displayed beautiful sugarloaves in the window.
meanings.sent2: I bought a sugarloaf to use in my baking.
meanings.sent3: The kids pretended the sugarloaves were magical mountains of sweetness.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as sweet as a sugarloaf on a sunny day.
meanings.sent5: The sugarloaves sparkled like diamonds under the lights.

meanings.definition: A loaf of sugar in the shape of a cone.
meanings.sent1: The chef crafted a perfect sugarloaf for the dessert.
meanings.sent2: The sugarloaves on the shelf looked tempting.
meanings.sent3: The sugarloaf rolled off the table and bounced on the floor.
meanings.sent4: The sugarloaf towered over the other treats like a sugary mountain.
meanings.sent5: The sweet scent of the sugarloaves filled the room.
